description: Golden examples for maintenance plan evaluation. These define quality criteria for each season.

winter.description: Winter focuses on heating systems, freeze prevention, indoor air quality

spring.description: Spring focuses on post-winter inspection, transition to cooling, cleaning

summer.description: Summer focuses on cooling, airflow, humidity control

fall.description: Fall focuses on winterization prep, heating system checks before cold weather

quality_criteria.has_priorities: All plans should have items with priority levels
quality_criteria.cites_sources: At least 50% of items should cite source documents
quality_criteria.has_markdown: Output should include valid markdown with checkboxes
quality_criteria.device_specific: Items should specify which device they relate to
